subject: Attention Beneficiary:
body:
Attention Beneficiary:
The transfer department of the Central Band of Nigeria (CBN) and the
President Federal Republic of Nigeria has decided to bring to your
attention, that you were listed as a beneficiary in the recent
schedule for payment of outstanding debts incurred by the (CBN)
governor from to 2012 According to your file, Your payment is
categorized as: contract type:/inheritance/unpaid contract
funds/undelivered, Your Payment file: No: is  RBI/id1033/09.Payment
amount: $10.500,000.00million. recently, on the 5th of FEBRUARY, 2023.
The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) Governor, Dr Godwin Emefiele .met
with the Senate Tax Committee and Ministry of Finance. Regarding
unclaimed funds which have been due for a long run, at end of the
meeting The president Muhammadu Buhari and (CBN) Governor, Dr Godwin
Emefiele mandate all unclaimed funds to be release back to the
beneficiary stating that its an unfair practice to withhold funds for
government basket for one reason or the other for tax accumulations.
Therefore, we are writing this email to inform you that( 10.5million
dollars ) will be release to you in your name, as it was committed for
(CBN) Governor that Beneficiary will have to pay crediting fees only.
So you are therefore required to pay ONLY credit fee Note: that is the
only money you are to pay to credit  your account immediately making a
decline for 2 working day after date of receiving this mail.
TEL:+234-8082451777
Reconfirm/provide your bank account details-for crediting.
GET BACK TO ME WITH THE BELLOW DETAILS;
1.) FULL NAME:------------------------- --
2.) AGE:-------------------------- -------
3.) SEX:-------------------------- -------
4.) ADDRESS:---------------------- -------
5.) ZIP/POSTAL CODE:---------------------
6.) STATE/PROVINCE:--------------- -------
7.) COUNTRY:---------------------- -------
8.) PHONE:------------------------ -------
9.) OCCUPATION/POSITION:---------- -------
10.) BANK DETAILS:---------------------- -
Regards,
JOHNSON OFIAJA

subject: Re:   Attention Beneficiary:
body:
Hello Johnson Ofiaja,

Wow, this is quite a surprise! I wasn't expecting such news. It's interesting to hear about the decisions made by the Central Bank of Nigeria and President Muhammadu Buhari. 

Could you please explain more about how my name ended up on this list? And what exactly does it mean that these funds are "unclaimed"? 

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "crediting fees"? How much would that be?

I'm sorry for all the questions, but I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Rose

subject: Attention Beneficiary: your Payment.
body:
Attn: Beneficiary,

I receive your mail with the content well noted. However all things being
equal this Morning i received your (FUND PAYMENT
APPROVAL/GUARANTEE) From office of the Accountant General of Federation.

However your Fund Payment Approval/Guarantee from the Accountant
General,and Governor  Central Bank of Nigeria CBN has guaranteed your
payment sum: $10.5Million United States, as Inheritance Fund, as soon as
your cost of transfer (cot) Crediting fee is confirmed your immediate
payment is guaranteed to you.

So you are hereby advised to Act Like a Wounded Lion and raise this last
$380 cost of Transfer (COT) Crediting fee very urgent for your immediate
account Crediting.

Do not delay anymore at this stage for your payment conclusion as soon as
possible.

payment made via western Union Money Transfer with below information.

Receivers name: Moses Nwigwe
Address: Lagos Nigeria

Do not abandon your payment, and if you are responding to any other office
you are advise to Stop and focus.

finally you are required to Reconfirm to us your banking details: passport
photo
home address and Telephone number.

waiting for your urgent response.
Regards
Barr. Ofiaja Johnson.
attached ID Card.
